As part of our mission to support local regeneration using the most advanced technology of our time, we are thrilled to announce the opening of the applications for the ReFi Local Node Beta Cohort + a 20k Gitcoin match funding pool for a Local Node featured round. Wait, what??? ü§Ø

In this post, we'll delve into several key points:

  • What is the Beta Cohort and who can apply for it?
  • What are ReFi DAO Local Nodes?
  • What is the ReFi Local Node Gitcoin Featured Round?
APPLY NOW

Local Nodes Regenerating the Earth üå±

Building on the successful launch of the Local Node Alpha Cohort focused on the Global South ‚Äì which resulted in the formation of 14 impressive new Local Nodes nodes and distributed over $25,000 in funding ‚Äì we're thrilled to announce that we're expanding our horizons.

Our forthcoming Local Node Beta Cohort is designed to empower local leaders, providing them with the tools, resources, and guidance necessary to successfully deploy their own ReFi DAO Node. But that's not all - our comprehensive program also includes steps on designing an innovative local node canvas, fundraising strategies, marketing techniques, and governance structures. Join us as we democratize finance and technology, one Local Node at a time. We invite you to be part of this endeavour that blends local action with global impact!

BECOME A LOCAL NODE

Who can become a Local Node?

Through the Local Nodes Beta cohort, we aim to aid the core team of perspective Local Nodes worldwide in crafting a compelling vision of regeneration, raising capital, and launching a Local Node token. This will be utilized to acquire land and other real-world assets for the benefit of local residents and the environment.

If you're intrigued by the idea of setting up a local node in your city, apply now and we'll get in touch soon. Our focus is to foster the emergence of Local Nodes in key startup cities globally, each with its own token, treasury, and vision of regeneration.

APPLY NOW

What is the Local Node Beta Cohort?

The Beta Cohort program will guide the Cohort participants through the entire process of setting up their own Local Node, based on the design patterns of ReFi DAO.

Local Nodes will collectively gather funds, establish their business model canvas define governance and ultimatly launch a token with a specific mandate to utilize at least 50% or more of the funds raised to acquire land and other real-world assets.

Local Nodes represent a pivotal element of the community network architecture being probed by ReFi DAO. Nodes signify the basis for global governance with local representation and local sovereignty.

How does it work? üîç

Step 1: If you are devoted to realizing regeneration in a city, apply now!

Step 2: After your submission is reviewed by the ReFi DAO team and current Local Node representatives, you will be invited to draft a Gitcoin GG18 Round grant proposal with the full backing of ReFi DAO.

Step 3: You will fundraise for your Local Node in the Local Node featured round, supported by the Celo Foundation and Celo Europe with a 20k cUSD match funding pool.

Step 4: You will be invited to gather your local community through Gitcoin activations station to promote and support the Gitcoin GG18 and donations via Optimism.

Join the next ReFi DAO Forum!
